item.title: Windows Terminal Command Line
item.description: Following on from my previous post about WSL Shortcuts - Windows Terminal v0.9 Release finally introduces command line support. You can now combine this with an old File Explorer task bar trick to bootstrap your awesomeness. Windows Files Explorer & Windows Terminal All of command line parameters that are supported are documented here. One nice trick is using split-pane to support different platforms simultaneously. So the following will open up a pane with both Powershell and Ubuntu side-by-side :)
